issue.title: [Python] DataFrame Interchange Protocol for pyarrow Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18152](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18152). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For the documentation and spec: <https://data-apis.org/dataframe-protocol/latest/index.html>
Blog post about it: <https://data-apis.org/blog/dataframe_protocol_rfc/>
 
Several DataFrame libraries now support this interchange protocol (pandas, modin, vaex, cudf).
